text: Porvoo Hunters is an ice hockey club based in Porvoo, Finland. The team played the 2018-2019 season in Suomi-sarja (the third top league in Finland after Liiga and Mestis. During the 2018-2019 season they finished 2nd overall and qualified for the promotion playoffs (for the first time) against Peliitat. ==External links== *porvoohunters.fi ==References== Category:Sport in Porvoo Category:Ice hockey teams in Finland Category:Ice hockey clubs established in 1997 Category:1997 establishments in Finland
title: Porvoo Hunters
